pre_caption: This is a scenery shot that moves slowly through a long, eerie hallway with tiled walls and repeating archways. The space is filled with a hazy, greenish-yellow light from a single round lamp and a brighter source at the far end. There are no moving subjects within the scene.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
original_caption: This is a scenery shot that moves slowly through a long, eerie hallway with tiled walls and repeating archways. The space is filled with a hazy, greenish-yellow light from a single round lamp and a brighter source at the far end. There are no moving subjects within the scene.
initial_feedback: The video features glowing circular light fixtures positioned on both the right and left walls of the hallway.

final_caption: This video captures a slow journey through a long, eerie hallway with tiled walls and repeating archways. The space is bathed in a hazy, greenish-yellow light, enhanced by glowing circular light fixtures mounted on both the right and left walls, contributing to the scene's unsettling ambiance. A brighter light source is visible at the far end, while the hallway remains devoid of any moving subjects.
